title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Rise as U.S. Lawmakers Scramble to Dodge Historic Debt Default
description: The potential compromise comes as America’s “X-date” approaches quickly.

title: Bitcoin breaks $28k threshold on debt ceiling decision, whales continue to accumulate
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin whales accumulate After slowing down accumulation, Bitcoin whales that hold 10,000 or more continue accumulating Bitcoin aggressively over the weekend. Debt ceiling update According to The Kobeissi Letter, “news that the debt ceiling deal was reached “in principle” last night,” as Bitcoin broke $28,000. They further go on to explain: “The debt […]

The post Bitcoin breaks $28k threshold on debt ceiling decision, whales continue to accumulate appeared first on CryptoSlate.
